data.message: i was playing on my FB page and changed my DOB to be funny. not so funny - how do i change it back, and prevent it from showing on my FB page as it does now?

replies.message: Hi Ginny, we require everyone using Facebook to provide their authentic name and birthday, so you always know who you're connecting with. Because of this there's a limit to how many times you can change your birthday. If you've recently changed it, you may have to wait a few days before you can edit it again. Check out the link below for more information on how you can change your birthdate and the settings of who can see it. https://www.facebook.com/help/563229410363824 -Elisha

Can you please help me do something against the harrassment and bullying my alma mater is receiving from an account named Kaye Marasigan...Reporting it doesn't seem to do anything to help me and my alma mater against it
